marker.comment: Savannah for 4th. Charleston on the 7th.
Docked in Charleston for weekend. Nancy may travel to Atlanta from here.
Nancy left me for Grand baby. On way to Myrtle Beech to get bottom job.
Alone in Myrtle Beech working yard. Go on hard till after grand baby trip.
Grandbaby Madison born 7/18. New mother/baby doing great. I join them Sunday.
On the road again. We are leavig Myrtle now heading for Norfolk.
We're in Wilmington. Wind 40 on the nose. May stay til 20 on the nose.
In Swan Pt. and headed for Morehead City and Pamlico Sound.
Moving to this protected marina today. Local winds now forecast 30-50.
We are hunkered down in Sea Gate Marina.12 miles inland north of Beaufort.
We are hunkered down in Sea Gate Marina. Best place to be in area.
Predicted for Wed. late afternoon. All lashed down and waiting.
No new news. 24 hrs. to go. 1st outter bans here now. Much better tomorrow.
We are fine. Just tired. 24 hrs. of loud wind. Zero boat damage.
Lots of local damage. We were in the best hole. Some boats on beach.We're fine.
Nancy flies to TN tomorrow. Move boat to Norfolk starting next Monday.
New friend loans J.a Miata til departure for Norfolk Monday with Mark aboard.
Mark, Sam Fields and I are in Oriental. Pamlico Sound to New Haven today.
Mark, Sam Fieldsand I are at Alligator River crossing sound toward Norfolk.
Mark and Sam have departed for home and Norfolk. Waiting on engine part today.
Part arrived but wind now N @ 30. Can't cross Albemarle (20 mi.) til wind drops
Crossed Albemarle. Repaired exhaust manifold doing well. Anchored in N. River.
Crossed Currituck Sound. Now in Virginia. Great Bridge tomorrow. 29 mi. to go.
In Great Bridge. 12 mi. from Norfolk. Go to Norfolk Thurs. Nancy Fri.
Docked @ Waterside downtown Norfolk. Boat doing great. Nancy returns Friday.
Nancy arrived. New friend provided car to airport. Life is good.
Being tourists in Norfolk and Portsmouth. North wind STILL 20 on bay.
Enjoying Norfolk festivals. Start up Bay tomorrow. Weather better.
Anchored in Hampton,VA. Weather looking much better.
